title: Honki de Nakechau Koi
sinopse:
A collection of 6 short stories. Each revolving a dramatic love story.

1. Crevasse (Sakurai Machiko)
2. Te wo Tsunaide ikou (Nekoyama Miyao)
3. Aishiteru yo hana (Minato Rin)
4. Towa no uta (Mitsuya Omi)
5. Cinderella no kutsu wo sagashite (Niiya Moeri)
6. 1999 nen chikyuu saigo no koi (Takahashi Rie)
